mapper.sql: id, status, createDate, lastModDate, invalidDate, orderNo, amount, detail, userId, payStatus, description, channel
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_orders ( createDate, lastModDate, invalidDate, orderNo, amount, detail, userId, payStatus, description, channel ) VALUES ( #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{invalidDate}, #{orderNo}, #{amount}, #{detail}, #{userId}, #{payStatus}, #{description}, #{channel} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_orders
status = #{status},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
invalidDate = #{invalidDate},
orderNo = #{orderNo},
amount = #{amount},
detail = #{detail},
userId = #{userId},
payStatus = #{payStatus},
description = #{description},
channel = #{channel},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_orders
status = #{map.status},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
invalidDate = #{map.invalidDate},
orderNo = #{map.orderNo},
amount = #{map.amount},
detail = #{map.detail},
userId = #{map.userId},
payStatus = #{map.payStatus},
description = #{map.description},
channel = #{map.channel},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_orders ( status, createDate, lastModDate, invalidDate, orderNo, amount, detail, userId, payStatus, description, channel ) VALUES ( #{map.status}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.invalidDate}, #{map.orderNo}, #{map.amount}, #{map.detail}, #{map.userId}, #{map.payStatus}, #{map.description}, #{map.channel} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_orders
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND invalidDate like CONCAT('%', #{invalidDate} , '%')
AND orderNo like CONCAT('%', #{orderNo} , '%')
AND amount like CONCAT('%', #{amount} , '%')
AND detail like CONCAT('%', #{detail} , '%')
AND userId like CONCAT('%', #{userId} , '%')
AND payStatus like CONCAT('%', #{payStatus} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{description} , '%')
AND channel like CONCAT('%', #{channel} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
